name: Livmialon
description:
Distract monsters by casting spells. Sneak by them to escape the dungeon! Explore secret passages and winding corridors but don't get trapped!

This is our entry in the game jam Trijam #152. There is a 3 hour time goal but we ended up taking around 4 hours.

Synopsis

As an apprentice wizard, you don't know too many spells. After being trapped in a dungeon by the evil archwizard, you think all hope is lost. But then you find an old spell book, labelled "Livmialon". Perhaps the spells depicted inside will make the monsters of the dungeon leave you alone and help you escape...

Controls

to move. <123> to start a spell cast, mouse to aim and click to cast.

Tools
  • phaser
  • tiled
  • aseprite
